name: Meal to Kill
description:
You are the royal taster! Your job is to keep the king alive. Make sure that he can eat what he wants, but not something that is dangerous or poisoned or just something he does not feel like eating.

Important tips!

There is a language switch on the start screen! Make sure to select English if you don't understand Russian :) 

The web version is known to have minor issues with sound and mouse pointer. Downloadable is recommended.

Dev notes

This time around we tried to make a simple small game but give it as much polish as we could in the limited time. The only game mechanic is dead simple but our game has nice visual and sound design!
